Namespace: ax

ax(component, attributes) → {htmlElement}

Creates an HTML element and inserts it in the DOM. The element is described by a component and any accompanying attributes. If the element has an `id`, it will replace an existing DOM element that has the same `id`. If the element does not have a matching `id`, the element will be appended to the <body>.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
component component any Component
attributes object to be applied to the component
Since:
  • 0.0.0
Source:
  • axf.js, line 18
Returns:
The new element
Type
htmlElement
